lender.name: Lynnette
lender.loan_because: I have my own business and know how hard it is to have access to capital. Giving back to help others is what I like to do!
lender.occupational_info: I run a small independent entertainment company that produces hip hop music, dvd movies, markets films, and publishes songs.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: There were a few times in my past that I wish I could have received a loan. So from that experience, I find this idea of helping others through "micro loans" so beneficial to making the world a better place and a good expression of Brother helping Brother/Sister!
lender.occupational_info: My work involves supporting the Computer Labs (software and hardware) for Business and Computer Science at a community college.

lender.name: Natasha
lender.loan_because: I am delighted to help support Kiva's mission and am grateful for the opportunity to help..
lender.occupational_info: Photographer and writer specializing in travel and fine art.

lender.name: scott
lender.loan_because: Small gestures, collectively, create huge impact
lender.occupational_info: I try to help hard working people reinvest the fruits of their labor for future security

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: I can and I should.
lender.occupational_info: Logistics

lender.name: John & Yoshiko
lender.loan_because: We believe that giving others the tools to help themselves will ultimately benefit everyone.
lender.occupational_info:
Yoshiko does accounting for several small companies.
John helps run an engineering company.

lender.name: Steve G.
lender.loan_because: Jesus Christ is my savior and model for how I should live.
lender.occupational_info: In the US life is too easy. Almost all homes have safe water and sanitation facilities. We are never more than a hundred yards from a source of good water and a safe place to pee.

lender.name: deborah&dennisyoshitake
lender.loan_because: What a great way to help someone! Kiva is a really personable way to give someone a hand up.
lender.occupational_info: I am in customer service and my husband dennis is a real estate agent for coldwell banker. My son tristan works at a sign company and my daughter angilece also is in customer service

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want people to pursue their dreams, to share their talent and passion. I'm very proud to be part of Kiva and I'd like to thank all the people involved for enriching my life. Thank you!
lender.occupational_info:
My Job: I am the founder and CEO of SEO Consultancy Services. My company offers services to businesses who have a website but are not receiving many visitors. With some efficient changes we can make their website rank high in search engines (example: Google). This brings them more visitors and more sales.
My Passions: I am the founder of Travel Amazing South America, a travel website with photographs, stories and tips on how to travel to South America.
I compose music and am currently working on a new CD with compositions inspired by my journey through Southeast Asia.

lender.name: Tom & Kirstin
lender.loan_because: We've always loved the sandals Kiva makes, so we thought that supporting their mission would be a good idea :)

lender.name: Robert & Family
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to need a helping hand! I wish you all good luck!
lender.occupational_info: Creates internet programs for the world wide web.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do......
lender.occupational_info: I work in retail.....enough said..

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I like knowing that I can make a difference in someones life who wants to better themselves.

lender.name: Vijay & Tripta
lender.loan_because: Small drops fill up the ocean. Every little bit helps.
lender.occupational_info: Great deal of satisfaction and therapy for the soul

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I move boxes around and also work in home heath care.

lender.name: Cara
lender.occupational_info: I make films with my husband. I also teach and study history.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I like that my small loan amounts work with other people's loans to really help an individual entrepreneur, who has a business plan in place and can hopefully make that investment grow into something great.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a telecommunications company, helping make sure circuit outages and other problems get fixed.

lender.name: Loes
lender.loan_because: baby shower gift

lender.name: Serenity
lender.loan_because:
As a local independent retailer, we are always thankful for the support we receive from our wonderful brides and grooms.
As a direct result of the purchases our customers make, we pass on the goodwill by helping the poorest entrepreneurs across the globe, set up in business and work their way out of poverty.
Without our fabulous brides and grooms, this would not be possible. Thank you for your support and thank you for making a positive difference to the lives of the people shown below.
Jennie x
lender.occupational_info: We are a professional wedding shop based in Newton Abbot, UK. We sell a lovely range of wedding dresses, bridesmaids dresses, mens suits and bridal accessories.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves to build a better life. This is the easy part. They do the hard part.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I like to help people trying to make it through hard work so that they will be always independent.
lender.occupational_info: I love working with children. I feel that respect is the abslolute most important factor in dealing with others and that many times we forget that we need to respect children as well as adults.

lender.name: John/Diane
lender.loan_because: This is one way that we can provide some assistance to those that need financial help to improve their business. Although the requested loan amounts seem to be small, these funds are significant in helping to expand their business. If these funds were not available, these business probably would not be able make the needed improvements.

lender.name: Topher
lender.loan_because: When no one forces anyone to help, when we do the right thing every time without prodding, then and only then will peace be achieved. This is my start.
lender.occupational_info: I learn as much as I can so that I may teach others to learn to love rather than fight.

lender.name: robert
lender.occupational_info: finding a cure for breast cancer

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I believe its everyone's responsability to use what they have to make the world a better place for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I use traditional plant medicines to help people get better, and remain well.

lender.name: Alexa
lender.loan_because: I want to share what I've got.

lender.name: Morgan Flanigan
lender.loan_because: It allows me the opportunity to aid those that are less fortunate than myself, especially those that have the motivation and business sense to pursue and contribute to free enterprise.

lender.name: Phillip
lender.loan_because: I had some money left over from my retirement account and thought a microloan would be a way to help someone else better themselves
lender.occupational_info: I help people solve their problems.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great idea to help others try to achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I help a global company manage their computer systems.

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help others.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: Americans are the most generous people in the world.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I think these micro loans are a great way to help people around the world. When I was in the Marines I traveled to many places and saw first hand how difficult it was for hard working people to get ahead. It makes me feel great that I can play a small part in helping them. People helping people, there should be more of this in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am married and have 4 kids. The two oldest are in collage. I got my U.S. Power Plant and Airframe license out of a trade school in Pittsburgh Pennsylvania. I have been working for Delta Air Lines for 21 years. Aircraft are such engineering marvels and fascinating to work on. I learn something new every day. I really enjoy my job.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I have the resources to HELP.
lender.occupational_info: I am a geography and Urban Planning Student. I plan on graduating with a Master's Degree.

lender.name: shannon
lender.loan_because: I am a young entrepenuer and female I truly know how hard it is to have a dream and not the finicial support you need.
lender.occupational_info: exciting and interesting.

lender.name: Samuel Uriah
lender.loan_because: It's my first birthday and I got a kiva loan as a gift. This could start a lifelong habit :)
lender.occupational_info: I play, I eat, I sleep, I eat, I play...

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: My students and I want to help others to better themselves. Everyone deserves a little help to get started.
lender.occupational_info: I teach adults who are working on making a better life for themselves as you are.

lender.name: Joseph & Lisa
lender.loan_because: A way to touch someone all around the word!
lender.occupational_info: Security Officer and Telecommucations

lender.name: Mayou Darius
lender.loan_because: What seems so little to us can make a huge difference to other people in the world. It feels great to be able to help others.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I have seen the need in other countries and know how much these loans can help.
lender.occupational_info: I research medical data to help Medicaid programs which help those who do not have insurance for their medical needs.

lender.name: Jeff Hoard
lender.loan_because: The internet has provided me with many opportunities in my life, I would like to use the internet to help less fortunate people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work from home, on a computer, looking for videos that I think people should watch.

lender.name: Sassan
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people in need of help

lender.name: Loretta & Reg
lender.loan_because: we are lucky enough to be able to

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I want to help propogate ownership in society.
lender.occupational_info: I do building maintenance in an ocean-front resort in Hawaii.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: It keeps me connected to other places and people.
lender.occupational_info: I teach foster parents who take care of abused children.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I'm happy to do my small part in helping people who just hope for a helping hand - not a handout - to provide for themselves and their families. Many of these hardworking people improve the lives of their communities through their efforts.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a stock broker who invests for individuals trying to save for their future and/or their retirement.

lender.name: Kris
lender.loan_because:
I saw a TV program about helping third world poverty, so here I am.
I didn't have much money when I was in my 20's so this is my way of helping those less fortunate than me, now that i am more financially secure..
lender.occupational_info: I maintain natural gas pipelines in Australia. I've been doing it for over 25 years.

lender.name: Mickey & Tetyana
lender.loan_because: I want to do something where I feel like I am making a difference in someone's life. I was very fortunate to be born in a wealthy country. I just want to share.
lender.occupational_info: I manage people who make the internet work for my company.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I love my work; I would not take so much as a penny for doing it if it wern't for the unfortunate necessity of money_ So, if one can afford to ease the burden of another's somewhat wanting cash flow, one ought to_ One cannot take it with oneself when one goes_
lender.occupational_info: I sew from scratch, or alter from existing garments, costumes for theatrical productions. When the costumes are made and the production goes into dress rehearsals, I often aid in the running of the show from the wardrobe end of things; which entails: helping peformers change costumes when they haven't time between scenes to accomplish the transformation on their own, mending the wear and tear, and seeing to the washing of the costumes_ When I'm not stitching, I often work as a carpenter or scenic painter creating the sets for the productions_ I sometimes even work as an electrician to put up the lighting for the shows.

lender.name: Sachin
lender.occupational_info: I work with a group to create software programs for engineers.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.occupational_info: I help schools, nonprofits, and other organizations with database and server administration.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I want to believe that my actions can impact the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am graduating from the University of Kansas with a major in political science and international studies. I am starting law school at the University of Missouri-Kansas City in the Fall.

lender.name: Hans
lender.loan_because: I have a blessed life.
lender.occupational_info: Office Manager at Frogster America, publisher of free MMORPG Runes of Magic. CPA student, online gaming industry professional, muay thai, boxing and fitness enthusiast, lady's man.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: It seems like a very worthwhile use of my money.
lender.occupational_info: I work with other teachers to use computers and other technology to enhance student learning.

lender.name: Andreas
lender.loan_because: I love to help people

lender.name: Babush
lender.loan_because: "Empty pockets never held anyone back. Only empty heads and empty hearts can do that." ~Norman Vincent Peale

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to get a better life.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: It is important to give others the opportunities that I have enjoyed.
lender.occupational_info: I teach/ taught civics, innovation, technology and history at the upper secondary school level.

lender.name: Karl Iver
lender.loan_because: Supporting private businees is the best way to secure development
lender.occupational_info: Helping fish farmers grow fish in an ecological efficient manner

lender.name: Silvia & Daniele
lender.loan_because:
Silvia loans because I asked her to do this thing together. I loan because I like this new way of helping others.
Daniele

lender.name: Leandros
lender.occupational_info: I am a junior high school student and I plan to take Economics as a major at college. Currently, I am taking intensive courses of Economics at school in the IB program. Also, I have taken Global Economics at Exeter's Summer session 2006 where I studied several topics, two of them being Microcredit and Microlending which really influnced me. I am in the process of writing a big paper for school on collusive oligopoly and I have done a paper on pollution and tradable permits.

lender.name: Bjarne
lender.loan_because: I see this as a different way to help people to help them self.
lender.occupational_info: I am working as a Director in a larger company and my territory is the Nordic (Denmark, Sweden, Finland & Norway).

lender.name: olivier
lender.loan_because: people in the poor part of the world have the same right than me to have something.
lender.occupational_info: I work behind a desk, doing administrative work

lender.name: 3B-EDITIONS
lender.loan_because: Lorsque chacun d'entre nous se sentira personnellement concerné par une personne plus en difficulté dans le monde, la misère sera définitivement éradiquée de la planète !

lender.name: Mr. M's 7th Grade Class
lender.loan_because: We want to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a perfect example of compassionate capitalism, and I'd much rather see some of my savings helping others than just sitting in a financial institution.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a former advertising copywriter who now writes about my own interests, and one of those interests is maintaining a blog from my own Anglican-Episcopalian viewpoint. A recent book is available from Amazon.com at the link below.

lender.name: Gale
lender.loan_because: I want to support people who are willing to work hard to better their lives and those of their families.

lender.name: Spence
lender.loan_because: It feels right.
lender.occupational_info: I'm self employed and deliver documents and packages throught-out Houston, Texas.

lender.name: Lise and Morten
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy. I can and therefore I should

lender.name: Anne and Joel
lender.loan_because: We want to help people in need, and we think that microfinance is an effective way to do this.
lender.occupational_info: Anne is a retired academic reference librarian who helped college students find information on topics they were studying, and Joel is a retired research scientist who is still studying DNA replication at a cancer research institute.

lender.name: Lotte
lender.loan_because: If you help a man, you help a man. If you help a woman, you help her entire family. I loan because Kiva is a way for me to help women trying to help themselves.

lender.name: Morgan
lender.loan_because: There are too many people in the developing parts of the world that are just as talented as us in the western world; they just lack opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that writes database software. I provide help by answering questions about our software to our customers (which are usually also software companies).

lender.name: josh
lender.loan_because: I think if we all gave more the world would be a better place. I have been very lucky to have the things I have and can give my boys. I wish everyone could be so lucky.
lender.occupational_info: I build custom homes for people who have more than most could even dream of.

lender.name: A and J
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful program that honestly wants to help people.
lender.occupational_info: A: Helps Disabled young adults find employment. J: helps injured workers receive benefits.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I always wanted to do something like this. Now ive found a portal that lets me do it.
lender.occupational_info: eBay

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to live in a country in which I have opportunity and a good standard of living. I feel strongly that we can have an impact on others in our communities and across the world if we work hard to become more aware of the challenges that others face and the ways in which we can help people in need, both here and abroad.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student of English Literature, and I also work in public relations.

lender.name: Jansler
lender.loan_because: I want to help others having a chance of fulfilling their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I have an educational company, within the area of IT and personal development.

lender.name: Ienni Family
lender.loan_because: We love people and want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Inhale, exhale, bless and love everyone and everything.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I believe that microcredit can change the world
lender.occupational_info: wealth management. prior to this occupation I spent 18 years lending money in the U.S.

lender.name: The Sample Family
lender.loan_because: To educate our family on geography, business and most importantly giving.

lender.name: Laura A.
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in other people's lives.....I care about helping other people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a large medical office supervising the work of younger women - hopefully helping them become the best that they can be at what they do.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur myself :-)
lender.occupational_info: I fix and build computers for other people as well as large companies.

lender.name: Marcus
lender.loan_because: It's a good way of fighting poverty.

lender.name: Jorgen Madsen
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to raise their standarts of living. I like the idea of microloans.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a company producing hearing-aids.

lender.name: chris
lender.loan_because: One can't decide where and when they are born, or how much money their family has - I got lucky, and I hope to help give others some of the opportunities that I've had.

lender.name: Kaya
lender.loan_because: I am the second child of a wealthy family in a wealthy country. My older brother, Loris, is 4 years old. He really loves me. My godfather decided to lend money in my name in order to provide business people in other countries with working capital.
lender.occupational_info: I am a 16 months old child. There is not really any work I do at the moment. My godfather is doing something in finance.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: To help others make their dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people understand what's happening in their lives from a spiritual stand point and empowering them to work through the situations in their life.

lender.name: Terri
lender.loan_because: I am going through very tough times right now, both financially as well as mentally. I have friends to lean on when needed. I know they are thinking of me and looking for ways to help make this time in my life a little easier. I want to feel like I am helping someone and making their struggle, just a little bit easier too.
lender.occupational_info: I design reports that extract data from various databases. These reports support all departments from accounting to the warehouse.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I enjoy loaning money to help hard working people improve their lives.

lender.name: Y-SMRUC
lender.loan_because: Our youth group did a fundraiser at our church and we want to use the money to help people develop their businesses around the world - mostly in Africa because we learned a lot about Africa.

lender.name: Andreas
lender.loan_because: The same reason you do, I guess...

lender.name: Maria and Jay
lender.loan_because:
We would like to bring our new child into a world that supports one another. (April 07)
Feb 09 update: We are now expecting our 2nd child in a few weeks. We are so glad to continue to support Kiva as we welcome a new spirit into this shared world!
lender.occupational_info: Maria is a naturopathic doctor and Jay works at a natural foods store. We are trying to help others live in their own best health and reach their full potential!

lender.name: Geena
lender.loan_because: I feel the need to help and do my best to do so. I am glad that there are organizations that help the people in need.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I have a strong belief in helping those who are willing to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work with client employers to improve their approach and practices working with employees.

lender.name: M Ram
lender.loan_because: I come from a country (India) where I have seen people struggling with basic requirements. I can understand very well how small amounts, like cost of a coffee in the developed world, can make a huge difference in the life of a family in the developing world. Kiva helps me fulfil my deepest feelings of helping the most needy.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a project manager in a semi conductor company building broadband communications. In simple terms, my company's products power the internet, TVs, internet phones, and the like.

lender.name: nico
lender.loan_because: I believe in people making their own money as an entrepreneur. I will support them.
lender.occupational_info: consultancy (local) government

lender.name: Gunvor Munch
lender.loan_because: I think helping people to help themselves is the best way to preserve peoples self-respect and dignity
lender.occupational_info: I teach nursing students anatomy and physiology, biochemistry, genetics, different religions and how to meet people from other cultures.

lender.name: Marechal Family
lender.occupation: IT Director inside a French Tour Operator
lender.loan_because: Be the change that you want to see in the world. (Gandhi) and it's better to do something ....

lender.name: joy
lender.loan_because: such a small amount can make a big difference. plus Kiva keeps you connected with the progress of how your loans impact real people

lender.name: John & Silvana
lender.loan_because: it's great to help someone develop a business on their own.
lender.occupational_info: John teaches high school in America and also helps to organize and develop career education opportunities for students. Silvana (originally from Australia) teaches Kinder and 1st grade.

lender.name: claira
lender.loan_because: I think this is a fantastic idea and a wonderful way to empower people to help themselves and others.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to raise issue about their national health service treatment in the UK.

lender.name: caroline
lender.loan_because: i can.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I realize there are people who have more of a need for it than I do.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a restaurant. I bring food out to people, I clean up tables, and I try to make the restaurant an enjoyable place to be.

lender.name: April
lender.loan_because: I'd want someone to loan to me.
lender.occupational_info: I tell important and interesting true stories so people can know more about the communities they are part of. And I empower others to express themselves through movement.

lender.name: Dennis & Vannessa
lender.loan_because: others have helped us become more successful, and we want to do the same for other people.
lender.occupational_info: We design computer chips

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: Why not? Do you?

lender.name: Matt
lender.occupational_info: Case Western Reserve University Pre-med

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: This is a powerful yet inexpensive way to help many people better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I've been unemployed since Oct '09, looking for work as a project/program manager for a company full-time managing prereleased software programs with customers. I'm also a part-time freelance graphic designer.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: It feels good

lender.name: The Happy Minimalist
lender.loan_because: I want to get a virtuous cycle going

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: Microlending is a wonderful idea, I love that a lot of people plus a small amount of money can make such a big difference to people.
lender.occupational_info: Photograph editor

lender.name: Anne-Marie
lender.loan_because: Micro lending with personal attention to each participant is effective. I enjoy seeing hard working entreprens reach their goals for the benefit of their families and communities.
lender.occupational_info: Constructing Power Plants worldwide. Has previously provided state development assistance and finance to small businesses.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Kiva seems like a great way to create opportunity because it allows people to use the money in the way that they know will be the most useful to them.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and manage afterschool programs for teenagers. In my class students learn to make music using computers and how to do sounds for movies. Students get to use their creativity and also gain computer skills.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I feel this program requires tremendous initiative and drive on the part of these people; I admire that. It is a system which keeps providing for many years to come.
lender.occupational_info: I am an college professor who teaches courses in communication. Like you, I constantly try to further myself through courageous endeavors. Good luck and god bless in all that you strive to accomplish!!

lender.name: bobby
lender.loan_because: i want to inlarge my petty trade
lender.occupational_info: is trading with clothing

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: Just wanted to help.
lender.occupational_info: My work consist of responding to help all people whom may have an emergecy such as fires, floods, medical, and just about any unforeseen accident.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed. Sharing and encouraging people around the world to achieve their dreams is so satisfying.
lender.occupational_info: I am a judge, making decisions about domestic violence, crimes, and traffic tickets, the stuff of average people who make occasional mistakes.

lender.name: caroline
lender.occupational_info: I am a 8th grade middle school student in massachusetts.

lender.name: Mickey
lender.loan_because: My parents were nice enough to open account for my 25th Birthday!

lender.name: Janet & Bill
lender.loan_because: My husband Bill and I lend because we have seen examples of how well micro-loans work in other parts of the world. The idea of Americans helping developing nations achieve success instead of bullying them or bombing them seems like the right idea to us. Micro-loans look like the perfect way to start and they are something everyone, no matter their economic status, can help with.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Credit Manager. My husband Bill has his own graphic design business.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: It's right to share.
lender.occupational_info: I provide medical care to people who have mental health problems.

lender.name: James and Dayna
lender.loan_because: My wife and I have been blessed with much love and material comforts and believe sharing such blessings is a duty and previledge. While we donate to various organizations, Kiva provides a much more personal venue for assisting others.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a project manager for an environmental consulting firm which principally represents large industrial clients that require the assistance of outside consultants to comply with governmental regulations to protect the environment.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: If we want to break the cycle of poverty, the best way to do so is to draw in capital and investment. I'm a firm believer in capitalism!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a school teacher.

lender.name: Geralin
lender.loan_because: We are one family and families help each other always.
lender.occupational_info: I want my students to be happy and successful and I help them learn how to stay on course or recognize when they are off course to their dreams and goals.

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: I want the world to be a better place and that starts as simple as people helping people. We loan as a family because we want to show our children that the world is bigger than just us and people need each other.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse in a large research hospital. I take care of sick people that have not been cured by convential treatment. For many of my patient, the experimental treatment we provide are their last hope of a cure.

lender.name: Ellie
lender.loan_because: Even though I can't work anymore, supporting Kiva's efforts is something I can do that makes me feel VERY connected to others.
lender.occupational_info: I used to set up programs to try to help protect the environment. I'm so glad to have found Kiva so that my loans can keep being reinvested to help some really special people..

lender.name: Curt
lender.loan_because: it makes me :-)

lender.name: Joan
lender.occupation: art teacher in an elementary school

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: Kiva is an easy way to make a significant impact for someone in a personal way. I also use Kiva to explain to my children how different others live throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with private and public drinking water systems and work with well drillers.

lender.name: Bavouzet
lender.loan_because: We are placed on the earth to be the caretakers of all that is here. Each generation has a responsibility to ensure the survival of our seventh generation. With microloans we can take small collective steps along with the kindness of others, and make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info:
I love to photograph and document the world I experience so that I may share it with my social studies students. There are two quotes that speak greatly of my beliefs.
1) Margaret Mead said: "Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has."
2) The Lakota have a wonderful saying. Mitakuye Oyasin. We are all One People!

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful opportunity for me, at no great cost to myself, to help someone who really needs it. It makes me feel very happy. I love this program!

lender.name: Teri
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to have all of my needs met. I want to help others have the ability to do that for themselves and their families. I believe that we need to treat each other with love and kindness and this is one way that I can do that.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I think everyone should have an opportunity to succeed. Though I am a only a college student and do not make very much money, I believe in sharing what I have with those less fortunate than I.
lender.occupational_info: I diagnose and repair computer problems, among other things.

lender.name: Shahnnen
lender.loan_because: I have been given so much, it's only right to give back. I've lived in Africa and traveled, and have seen the sadness of poverty coupled with the sheer happiness of their dispositions.

lender.name: Provenio Software
lender.loan_because: We're a small business and we support small businesses and entrepreneurs everywhere.
lender.occupational_info: We make a computer software product called Say the Time®, which is a fun personal time management utility.

lender.name: Hattie
lender.loan_because: I believe that even a small contribution by an individual can make a big difference in the lives of many.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I love the concept of helping someone help themselves...I've been lucky enough to receive help when needed, so now it's my turn...
lender.occupational_info: My wife Tara & I have been playing in a rock band for the past 13 years...Tara sings & plays bass, and I play the drums...while it's very mentally/creatively rewarding, it is not financially, so I work at an ad agency during the day...

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: this is the only useful thing I do on the internet.

lender.name: Jason & Stevie
lender.loan_because: We don't agree with lenders making profits when there are private individuals who are willing to take on the risk to help a fellow entrepreneur.
lender.occupational_info: Jason designs and programs websites. Stevie works in the library at a local University.

lender.name: Elise
lender.loan_because: I am excited to help in this small way! I am especially interested in giving back to women in the Dominican Republic, after being the recipeint of so much hospitality while living there for 2 years as a Peace Corps member.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: "A hundred times every day I remind myself that my inner and outer life depends on the labors of other men, living and dead, and that I must exert myself in order to give in the measure as I have received and am still receiving." - Albert Einstein

lender.name: Hibbary
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I draw and paint. Constantly. ha ha

lender.name: Sakthi
lender.loan_because: it gives these entrepreneurs the opportunity they deserve

lender.name: Lene
lender.loan_because: I do hope that I help to make a difference to the people I make a loan

lender.name: Kip
lender.loan_because: This is a way to make a tangible difference in someone's life. We need to help out wherever we can and as often as we can to those less fortunate than us.
lender.occupational_info: I manage people, process and technology to make life better for my company.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I want to help make things better
lender.occupational_info: I write stories for children

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I feel that investing in a person in another country demonstrates a trust and connection far beyond making a simple donation. A small amount of my pay each month can help several businesses succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I design robots that are sent to Mars.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I am passionate about women's economic, social and political empowerment and I want to contribute to helping achieve sustainability of women in the developing world, and especially in Africa.
lender.occupational_info: I am a young lawyer and I work in aircraft finance, which means that I work on contracts that arrange lending of money to aircraft operators, like airlines, to buy the aircraft or to lease aircraft. However my first job as a lawyer was in Botswana, Africa and that is where my passion for Africa and women's empowerment began.

lender.name: Claus Kjær
lender.loan_because: Microcredits is a great way to give poor, but creative and entreprenurial people a helping hand!

lender.name: Mikael Toxværd
lender.loan_because: Hope that it will give someone longterm help.

lender.name: April & Gabe
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do, I wish I could do more.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people accomplish their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computer systems.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I want to support people around the world who are working hard to build a business and support their families and communities.

lender.name: Alaina
lender.loan_because: I quote Mahatma Ghandi: Start by being the change you want for the world. I like that because a lot of people talk about transformation of all kinds but really it has to start from oneself. If we all lived the change that we want for the world, we'd see amazing results.
lender.occupational_info: I design websites and create wallpaper murals, brochures and other print materials for individuals and companies. I'm also an energy healer. I used to work in the hotel/restaurant industry and also in public libraries.

lender.name: Fifi
lender.loan_because: I am able to help, and it feels good to assist even if it is in a small way. "You must be the change you wish to see in the world" Mahatma Gandhi

lender.name: kananko
lender.loan_because: I want people in developing countries to begin any business for development of their abilities.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student, studying politics.

lender.name: alana
lender.loan_because: i live in a country where i am paid a pension because i am disabled. i have very little money but i want to share it with those who need a lend.
lender.occupational_info: i don't work. my body doesn't work properly.

lender.name: Indra
lender.loan_because: It is good to see the direct results of simply lending to assist in providing a practical need. It feels much more effective than lending to a larger organization and not being able to see the results. I think the direct connection between lenders and recipients that Kiva provides will encourage more lending.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a great opportunity to help people with their business, and ultimately their life. I think the loan format allows people to have more of a sense of dignity than a gift or regular charity...
lender.occupational_info: I publish a small magazine.

lender.name: New York Sean
lender.loan_because: H, E & I can.
lender.occupational_info: We want to change lives.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: Many people helped me to succeed in my business. I would like to help others in the same way.
lender.occupational_info: Retail

lender.name: Stephen and Pattie
lender.loan_because: It's simply the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I teach reading, English and math to people who are trying to better themselves. Pattie designs publications and practices art therapy.

lender.name: DePaul ELA
lender.loan_because: We are concerned for others in the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are an intensive academic English program serving university students from all over the world.

lender.name: Lance and Erika
lender.loan_because: The world is unfair.
lender.occupational_info: Abstractionist painter and lyricist

lender.name: Brett
lender.loan_because: There are people who need the money more than I do.

lender.name: jeff
lender.loan_because: Someone, somewhere, needs it more than I do.

lender.name: Randall
lender.loan_because: I have a very blessed life and want to give back to the world.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: I've travelled a lot, and seen the lives of people who haven't had the opportunities I've had.
lender.occupational_info: I work with software engineers to understand how their products work and write manuals, online help and Web pages.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I believe in active help that gives people a fair chance in life.

lender.name: ADRIANE
lender.loan_because: it helps individuals-real people. It makes a big difference in their lives.

lender.name: Lillian
lender.loan_because: this was my mother's day gift, a gift that I can help others.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I have been lucky enough to travel through Africa and met some fantastic people. I love the opportunity of direct involvement and feedback of how people are doing.
lender.occupational_info: I advise people in factories (like car and aircraft engine factories) how to work efficiently - saving money, material and time.

lender.name: Gideon
lender.loan_because: Micro-lending has not only proven to be one of the most effective ways of working toward an egalitarian world economy, but it is a way that individuals can truly affect change. It is a basic human right to have access to credit.

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: i enjoy the giving of money
lender.occupational_info: i create web sites

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: to help entrepreneurs become more independent
lender.occupational_info: I organize and guide groups of people in outdoor adventures such as backpacking and kayaking

lender.name: Mushter
lender.loan_because: It may sound trite, but I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked in internet related technology services business my entire career. Helped launch an NYC-based startup that created an online marketplace to enable wholesale trading of artisan made goods. Being a lender on Kiva allows me to get involved, again, in aiding small producers from around the world.

lender.name: Khan
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I love being connected in this small way to people I otherwise wouldn't know.
lender.occupational_info: I help create textbooks about computerized accounting for small businesses.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: It is good to see how someone else in a foreign land can find help from me, as I am also far away. Maybe because the world is smaller, we can try to make it better for each other.
lender.occupational_info: I work with my hands.

lender.name: hien
lender.loan_because: people should help when they can

lender.name: oscar dana & paul
lender.loan_because: don't give fish , but teach how to catch a fish
lender.occupational_info: oscar is 1st class liceo sentifico dana is artist & farmer paul is hide trader & gelatine producer

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: it's the best way to help fight poverty: letting people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work at the central bank of the United States (the Federal Reserve) as an economics researcher. In a nutshell, I use statistics and economic models to stuy how macroeconomies fluctuate (prices, employment, production, etc).

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: Ever since "60 minutes" did a story on micro loans in Bangledesh 10 years ago, I have always loved the idea. Now, thanks to the people at Kiva, I can easily get involved in what should be an enormously successful movement.
lender.occupational_info: I run a small department of a Large Store.

lender.name: Dr. Deena
lender.loan_because: Microfinance works
lender.occupational_info: College professor and researcher in Microfinance and international development.

lender.name: jason
lender.loan_because: I have always wanted to help in the places I have visited but never had the mechanism to allow me to do it in a constructive way.
lender.occupational_info: I am a travel and commercial food photographer.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: I want to give someone the chance to make a better life for themselves and to help them become a productive and economic benefit within their community. Unity and equality through the organic growth of economics. When we help others, we help ourselves. It's a worthwhile investment.
lender.occupational_info: I drive a flatbed tractor trailer across country. I go to many places and deliver lumber and steel and other construction materials. I have been doing this since 1989.

lender.name: Sang Yoon
lender.loan_because: I have received so much during my short lifetime.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I enjoying helping others.

lender.name: Steph
lender.loan_because: Kiva empowers people to improve the quality of their lives on their terms.
lender.occupational_info: Always working on the lifelong task of being a decent human being on the planet.

lender.name: alexandra, photographer
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to have a dream to succeed, and to have $ as the only thing holding you back from achieving your goals.
lender.occupational_info: I take photographs of the beauty in the world, and share them with people by way of art, books and websites.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I want to help people directly and put the money where it's needed most.
lender.occupational_info: I help the banking system work.

lender.name: Birgitta
lender.loan_because: With this I want to teach my grandsons (now 3 1/2 years and 18 months old) two things: 1. The difference between offering a helping hand and a handout. 2. That the more positive contacts they make with the rest of the world the better their future will be.
lender.occupational_info: I listen to and support women, men and young people who are having a difficult time solving problems in their life, e.g. resolving family or work related conflicts, or helping them to overcome their fear of changing a way of thinking or behaviour.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I know how much it means to get the money you really need.
lender.occupational_info: I create fuel and food from farm products

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I have seen the man who has not any legs to stand...and I stare down at my shoes.
lender.occupational_info: small things with great love.

lender.name: scott
lender.loan_because: I'd just lose in the stock market otherwise

lender.name: Teckie
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed to have more than enough and I want to be a blessing to others.

lender.name: Jes
lender.loan_because: my money is God's money and so it is only fair to share it....
lender.occupational_info: I am here to spread the love of christ

lender.name: Barger family
lender.loan_because: I like the idea, that in some small way, I may be helping someone gain independence and improve their life. Chase the dream....
lender.occupational_info: I provide support to scientists developing novel approachs to the challenges facing the world today.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I spent the summer after my first year of law school working at the Forum for Women, Law, & Development in Kathmandu, Nepal. I was able to see firsthand the difficulties faced by people in developing countries. Microfinance loans are one of the most effective ways to improve someone's quality of life.

lender.name: Jack & Kay
lender.loan_because: God has been good to us and we wish to help make an difference in this world.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I want to feel like I'm giving back. I want to use my success as a means to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an academic research lab

lender.name: Amos
lender.loan_because: I believe in people who make the efforts and take the opportunities to better their lives and those around them.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses and organizations make better use of their information and assets.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: even though the sun might be shining outside of my window...somewhere in the world the rain is coming down hard on someone else's "day".

lender.name: Only4Him
lender.loan_because: all good things come from the Lord. I am giving to others because it pleases Him!
lender.occupational_info: I teach fourth grade students. I also travel around the world telling others about God.

lender.name: Helen and Matt
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to help people in need.

lender.name: Adams Family
lender.loan_because: We love teaching our children how great it is to help others and to learn about different parts of the world! By small and simple things, great things are brought to pass.

lender.name: Ken & Art
lender.loan_because:
May, 2007: Seems like a powerful idea to enable people to help themselves to build the lives they want. We're definitely going to give this a try....
Update: September, 2007. Lending funds to small businesspeople in developing countries has proven to be even more rewarding than we expected. Each of the worthy borrowers has repaid a good share of the loans and all are successful enough to meet the monthly payment schedule. We enjoy reading the reports of their success. When the loans are fully repaid, we'll re-lend the funds to more hardworking small businesspeople around the world.
Update: October 2007. More than half of the entrepreneurs in our portfolio have already repaid 50% or more of their small starter loans. We enjoy reading the updates on their businesses.
Update: January, 2008. Our first loan to a woman in Nigeria has been fully repaid and we reloaned the money to a group of women in Pakistan.
Update: March 2008. Well this experiment is really working well. 5 of our original loans have already been paid back in full and we've reloaned the funds to other businesswomen and also made some more loans with new funds.
We love food and particularly love MEAT. So lately, we've focused our lending portfolio on the women who make the world a better place through meat. Check out the photos of knife-wielding ladies from Peru to Nigeria to Cambodia and beyond, purveyors of Beef, Pork, Guinea Pigs, Goats, and more. We tip our hats to Kiva for the great meat and animal photos. Kiva really is making the world a better place: capitalism and carinvorism, an idea we can really get behind.
May 2008: We've been Kiva lenders for a year now and it has worked out great.
September 2008: We joined Kiva Community Team Vermont...Jeezum Crow! Click here to Join:
http://www.kiva.org/app.php?page=community&action=viewTeam&team_id=215
May 2009: It's been two years and we've done 38 loans so far. The experience has been great, and we can recommend Kiva to all our friends. This is so much better than sending food because it helps people become self-sufficient.
July 2009: Meat is good business around the world. And we don't lend to commies. Sorry Viet Nam, you're on your own. 42 loans so far.
September 2009: 47 loans so far. More lady butchers from Mongolia to Peru.
April 2010: 57th loan went to Gregoria in Bolivia.
October 2010: 69th loan went to Magdalena in Philippines to raise delicious pigs.
October 2011: Up to 102 loans so far. Meat & fish by women around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Ken comes up with new ideas for businesses and Art is a full-time college student, majoring in Geology and minoring in Environmental Science.

lender.name: Zac
lender.loan_because: I think this is the best way to impact the world.
lender.occupational_info: I analyse business, what more can I say. Mostly inventory costs.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I want to help others build economic wealth for themselves and their communities.

lender.name: Suzanne and Mark
lender.loan_because: We want to help other people and give back to the world.
lender.occupational_info: I write children's books. My husband plays in an orchestra (trombone) and has a small computer business.

lender.name: Shayne Hughes
lender.loan_because: People want to evolve and create their lives, and this is a meaningful, sustainable way to support that.
lender.occupational_info: I liberate people from the inner prisons of their ego

lender.name: Fritz
lender.loan_because: There is great need in the world and God has blessed me so much. This program gives hope to so many.
lender.occupational_info: I teach college students that want to go out into the world and make a difference in the lives of teenagers.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: Microfinancing is the most effective, efficient, and sustainable system for increasing local economies around the world. Kiva enables me to reach out and directly help hardworking entrepreneurs, so that they can in turn help themselves, their families, their communities, and our world.
lender.occupational_info: I grew up on a farm in the state of Missouri, which I still own. I live in California, in the Silicon Valley and work with many companies to develop new products, services, and technologies.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I like to help people out.
lender.occupational_info: I like to travel...

lender.name: René
lender.loan_because: business makes business
lender.occupational_info: sales

lender.name: Arnaud & Estelle&Eloane
lender.loan_because: It's normal for us to help the others..

lender.name: Fernandez
lender.loan_because: i like the world and this is a good way to help other people build their lives.
lender.occupational_info: i do computer assistance for business (software and network)

lender.name: Ricardo
lender.loan_because: Because this is GREAT. Because everybody needs a chance. Because we spent a lot of money in stupid things we don't need. And because this is FUN!

lender.name: Jeremy & Nina
lender.loan_because: Ending poverty will require the resources of the first world and the ingenuity of the third.
lender.occupational_info: Military Officer

lender.name: AlsaceForum
lender.loan_because: For the price of a dinner in a restaurant I can help someone to be proud of himself. www.alsaceforum.com

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: The Kiva project is an excellent way to help being one out of a hopefully fast growing numer of drops in the ocean.

lender.name: Regis
lender.loan_because: it can help somebody and I can know via Kiva these persons
lender.occupational_info: I design structures of cars

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: It simply seems right.
lender.occupational_info: Helping

lender.name: Erin
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student studying Anthropology and Women's and Gender Studies.

lender.name: Linda and Robert
lender.loan_because: I want to help others better their lives
lender.occupational_info: I help people and groups achieve more peaceful and happy lives

lender.name: Marcelo
lender.whereabouts: Ciudad de Bs As Buenos Aires
lender.loan_because: I want to take the opportunity to show the person who borrows that I do care.
lender.occupational_info: I am the CSR manager of a large Argentinean company.

lender.name: Rhonda
lender.loan_because: I enjoy the ability to help others expand their capabilities and reach a new level of self-sufficiency.
lender.occupational_info: I compose and direct the application of policies and procedures for my employer, to ensure equality for the business and our employees.

lender.name: Axel & Francina
lender.loan_because: I want to help others based on the principle: Give fish, that is food for one day. Give a boat and they now are self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I design the electrical distribution systems for large commercial buildings.

lender.name: Vinod S
lender.loan_because: empower the poor so that they can lead a decent life and help others in the process
lender.occupational_info: analyzing and writing software

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepeneur who would like to give everyone one the opportunity to make a living through entrepeneurship. Giving this opportunity to women in much less fortunate countries is an honor and a privilage. I salute them all and my goal is to lend to everyone I can.
lender.occupational_info: By day I am an ultrasound technician, happy to tell mom's if they are having a boy or girl. The rest of the time, I sell craft supplies on the internet to people all over the world. I cut and press fabric, we sell yarns and knitting and crocheting supplies. Although it is hard work, I know that it will payoff and that I will be able to someday very soon support my family through my own business.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I've travelled all over the world and seen how hard people work to support their families. I'm grateful to be in a position to help make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to people who have come to the United States to find a better life for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Sue and Bob
lender.loan_because: We were successful entrepreneurs and admire others with the entrepreneurial spirit. We are now in a position to help others. It "feels good."
lender.occupational_info: Our business was to help others through training and development. We worked with individuals and businesses to help them improve and be more successful.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I think it is a good way to help those less fortunate than myself.

lender.name: Kris Loken
lender.loan_because: it gives me great joy to be able to help in this small way.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from USAID and now work on healthcare reform and Middle East peace from my home in West Virginia.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: People need help. I know what it is like to need support for a business idea. The best thing we can do as people is support each other's goals, hopes and dreams and to encourage the entrepreneur within us all.

lender.name: Paul, Andrea & Baby Jake
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in a meaningful way to the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: Paul is an English teacher and musician. Andrea is a computer engineer. We have been married for five years and Jacob Paul was born to us in April 2009. We want to make sure that Jake always knows that he is a global citizen and that by helping anyone he is helping everyone.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: it helps businesses get started and operate.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering people to make positive changes in their lives. I have been given much...the least I can do is to give a little.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 15 and 16 year old students World History and European History at a public high school in Texas, USA.

lender.name: Katja
lender.loan_because: I want to see people reach their business goals which in turn will improve their quality of life. If I can provide assistance to help them achieve this, I will!

lender.name: Bobbi
lender.loan_because: I believe that people who are striving to improve their lives and lives of people around them are the best possible investment.

lender.name: Matt and JoAnna
lender.loan_because: we feel as Christians it is important to show the love of Christ to people in need.
lender.occupational_info: We are college students at Asbury College. JoAnna cleans houses and makes smoothies(blended fruit drinks), and Matt is training to become a financial representative.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of small actions multiplied
lender.occupational_info: I have a passion for international travel and learning about other cultures

lender.name: Jennie
lender.loan_because:
I am blessed.
The best portion of a good man's life is his little, nameless, unremembered acts of kindness and of love.
-William Wordsworth

lender.name: Candy
lender.loan_because: Karma - Helping others makes the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Semi-Retired & Part-time dog sitter.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I can't imagine the hardships that many of the borrowers face and this is the most direct way to help them achieve a better life.

lender.name: Huron
lender.loan_because:
This is how very small businesses can raise non-equity capital.
They don't have time to market their financial needs to institutions, and financial institutions can't justify pro-active lending to very small businesses.
lender.occupational_info: Technical writer, Entrepreneur (computer store), Real estate sales and development, University teacher (economics and finance).

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: Can't really explain it other than it feels right. Furthermore, I do not have any qualms with the Kiva method for helping other people.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.occupational_info: I am a political science student at emory university and am currently studying globalisation and developmental economics at the university of cape town

lender.name: Irene
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to directly help people around the world who need help to care for their families. God has blessed me with so much in this life that I am happy to share my blessings.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers. I am going back to school to learn to be a teacher of mathematics. I live with my husband and 11 year old daughter in a house in New Hampshire where we raise chickens and geese where we enjoy the blessings of good health and the love of family and friends.

lender.name: Viv
lender.loan_because: I truly believe in giving back to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a self employed owner of a printing company. In my spare time I am also a facilitator for a womens orginization. There is nothing more rewarding then helping a person get on track with their lives.

lender.name: Julien
lender.loan_because: I want to share my luck.

lender.name: Southern Illinois Univ.
lender.loan_because: As students of international affairs, we acknowledge the difference and impact the little we donate can make to others in less privileged circumstances.

lender.name: Sharing
lender.loan_because: Someone needs to.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because:
"Until one is committed, there is hesitancy, the chance to draw back-- Concerning all acts of initiative (and creation), there is one elementary truth that ignorance of which kills countless ideas and splendid plans: that the moment one definitely commits oneself, then Providence moves too. All sorts of things occur to help one that would never otherwise have occurred. A whole stream of events issues from the decision, raising in one's favor all manner of unforeseen incidents and meetings and material assistance, which no man could have dreamed would have come his way. Whatever you can do, or dream you can do, begin it. Boldness has genius, power, and magic in it. Begin it now."
W. H. Murray in The Scottish Himalaya Expedition, 1951/ Goethe
lender.occupational_info: I work with others to find ways to improve the quality of healthcare.

lender.name: Li Anne Waioli
lender.loan_because: I care and I want to help make a difference in other people's lifes
lender.occupational_info: Constant use of my creative energy and ability to innovate.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: people need help. This is something I can do to help them.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a large computer network for a ski resort in Colorado.

lender.name: Ed and Margo
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes it easy to empower others to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: A Veterinarian cares for the health and medical needs of animals. A Social Worker helps those people (elderly in this case) in need of special services.

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: I believe in trade, not aid. Through conscious commerce, people can change their lives. I loan - joyfully, respectfully - because I can!
lender.occupational_info: I help socially responsible businesses who need more clients to communicate their value so they thrive!

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I loan because I believe if one person takes the view of a little goes a long way. Then what if everyone gave a little? It would be a very very long way.
lender.occupational_info: I make sheets of very expensive wall paper for the aerospace industry.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I believe it's the responsibility of those who can to help those in need.

lender.name: Felipe Garcia
lender.loan_because: The waves ripple out.
lender.occupational_info: Custom,one of a kind,deerskin garments.

lender.name: Sophia
lender.loan_because: People all over the world deserve to have opportunity in helping their family and themselves. We all deserve the chance to succeed. I hope every entrepreneur on this program becomes the best business owner they can be. God bless them and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a small business owner that specializes in the sales of office products, such as printers, toner cartridges, and other office supplies.

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Christian and Robyn
lender.loan_because: I have been given the great privilege of being able to help make a difference in another persons life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a wood sculpture and a mosaicist.

lender.name: gap
lender.loan_because: Great & simple idea to help people less fortunate than I am ...
lender.occupational_info: I design boats -ferries, workboats and tourist vessels ......

lender.name: Beth, Enver, Sam & Leo
lender.loan_because: There is nothing better than helping someone realize a dream.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I have the money, and others need it. This is probably the best use yet of the Internet!

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with resources that another entrepreneur a continent away can use to launch a business and provide for others.
lender.occupational_info: Brian Anderson is a selection expert and takes human capital very seriously. The dictionary says recruitment is to “supply with new members”, it also says to ”strengthen” that is the power of BA Search Group.

lender.name: Olivia
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving people the tools to help themselves.

lender.name: Marty
lender.loan_because: I feel that we should do all that we can to help those in need
lender.occupational_info: I help unemployed individuals

lender.name: Aidan and Evan
lender.loan_because: I want to share our blessings with others

lender.name: bethy
lender.loan_because: ...I [Almighty God] have chosen: to loose the chains of injustice and untie the cords of the yoke, to set the oppressed free and break every yoke... to share your food with the hungry and to provide the poor wanderer with shelter— when you see the naked, to clothe him, and not to turn away from your own flesh and blood... Then your light will break forth like the dawn, and your healing will quickly appear... [Isaiah 58] May Jesus bless you!
lender.occupational_info: I support project managers, coordinating/finalizing documents, publications and presentations, using various software tools/systems.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.occupational_info: Right now I work in a daycare with one year-olds. I am going to school for my masters degree.

lender.name: Jordyan
lender.loan_because: Micro-loans are the most direct way to empower someone to take control of their future. Personal initiative should be encouraged by investment worldwide!
lender.occupational_info: Former Kiva Fellow. Studying for my MBA in Social Entrerpreneurship at Oxford University.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: Just trying to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I teach literature and history to 11 - 14 year olds.

lender.name: Rosy
lender.loan_because: many small-scale farmers in developing countries just need a few more resources to increase productivity and standard of living. One small loan can make a big difference!

lender.name: Jason Shugars
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and want to share those blessings.
lender.occupational_info: I make the ads go for www.imeem.com.

lender.name: Dawn

lender.occupational_info: I'm a counselor with youth who are chemichally dependent.

lender.occupational_info: My wife builds wind turbines to generate energy and I am an attorney.

lender.name: Saul
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: The Wagners
lender.loan_because: I would like to help others financially and especially appreciate the "no middle man" aspect of KIVA.
lender.occupational_info: I teach US History and Current Events to juniors and seniors in a middle class town in Maine.

lender.name: Jourdan
lender.occupational_info: I am attending UC Berkeley in the fall and hope to major in Developmental Studies and International Relations.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: i care
lender.occupational_info: i go to school

lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.loan_because: those who have, should give.
lender.occupational_info: i attend college at Southeastern Louisiana University and work for a non-profit organization called City at Peace.

lender.name: Kenzi
lender.loan_because: If I were starting a business, I would need help too. Pay it forward.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I like the idea that a small amount to me can make a difference in someone else's life. It's important to help others if you're able to.
lender.occupational_info: In-home dog training, behavioral counseling & boarding

lender.loan_because: "Kiva" is a very efficient and direct means of developing promising enterprises around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Design, build and repair roads, highways, bridges, runways, drainage facilities etc.

lender.loan_because: I want to use God's blessings on me to alleviate the suffering of those who are less fortunate than I am.
lender.occupational_info: I design circuits.

lender.name: huirub
lender.loan_because: little bit little bit help lor

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: it's simple and sensible -- and it's wonderful to know that an ordinary person like me CAN do something. I'm honoured to be in business with my partners around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Most of my work is children's literature. I never outgrew my love of children's stories.

lender.name: Joanie
lender.loan_because: it helps someone to have a better life. I have a good life and I have this privilege and opportunity to provide this loan.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Sheila from Scotland
lender.loan_because:
I have run my own business for 20 years and have great respect for those also willing to take that risk.
This is a way of repaying those who helped me when I started.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: it is easy, satisfying and achieves something.
lender.occupational_info: I make bad news seem good and good news seem better

lender.name: Jemela
lender.loan_because: Money is like blood it must be circulated to maintain good economic health.
lender.occupational_info: It is a light -touch laying on of hands that releases tensions deep in the body to relieve pain and dysfunction and helps to improve health and performance for the whole body.

lender.name: Keava Koo
lender.loan_because: I want to give people the opportunity to proactively improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Self-employed technical project manager for large companies.

lender.name: Jackie
lender.loan_because: I want to empower women who don't have the means or the opportunities readily available to them.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a newspaper group that is located in New York City. My job is to manage advertisers who place their ads on our different websites.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I know what a difference micro-lending can make in people's lives.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I received a loan to start my own business. Once I had achieved my goals, I promptly paid this loan back. If I had not received this loan, I would not be where I am today.
lender.occupational_info: I program Oracle Databases for large corporations

lender.name: Stacey

lender.loan_because: I support people creating their own business
lender.occupational_info: I design and update webpages

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great way to help others. My money can stretch a lot farther this way too, which is awesome!
lender.occupational_info: I work with 9 and 10 year old boys and girls (about 20) in a classroom teaching everything from math and reading, science and history, to life and respecting each other.
